revised_title: Frederic Wood Jones: A Pioneering Biologist and Explorer
tldr: Frederic Wood Jones was a pioneering biologist and explorer who made significant contributions to the study of coral reefs and atoll formation. He conducted extensive field research in the Cocos-Keeling Islands and other locations, and his book "Coral and Atolls" provided a unique perspective on coral growth and reef formation. Jones's work inspired future researchers and helped shape the understanding of coral reefs as living ecosystems.
